definition: character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)

sentences.english: Is typical of China's coastal muddy silt.
sentences.chinese: 是我国典型的粉砂淤泥质海岸。

sentences.english: I am interested in meeting good people. I prefer quality over quantity.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢善良的人，我觉得质比量重要。

sentences.english: Effects of rice bran addition on farinograph parameters of dough and quality of steamed bread were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了添加米糠对面团粉质特性和馒头品质的影响。

sentences.english: Q is for quality, quality matters more than quantity.
Q is for quality, quality matters more than quantity.
King Sejong the initiative of the Han nationality's culture has been a qualitative leap.
sentences.chinese: 世宗大王的这一创举使韩民族的文化得到了质的飞跃。

sentences.english: Many species of invertebrate have shells or skeletons made of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 无脊椎类的好多物种有碳酸钙质的外壳或骨骼。

sentences.english: As a resul t, nacre thickness is sometimes just a cosmetic layer t hat can wear thin over time.
sentences.chinese: 所以真珠质的厚度就像脸上化妆品，不久就会磨薄了。

sentences.english: The currently agreed definition of homogeneous material introduces the concept of "mechanically disjointing".
sentences.chinese: 目前可接受的均质材料的定义包括机械拆分的概念。

sentences.english: Zhi imitated the natural sounds of wood and streams to make music.
sentences.chinese: 质“模仿山林溪谷的天籁音响制作了乐歌。

sentences.english: They also help the body break down collagen in skin production.
sentences.chinese: 他们还有助于分解肌肤新陈代谢中产生的胶原质。

sentences.english: The result of this shearing force is to push the endoplasm forward.
sentences.chinese: 这种剪切力作用的结果是推动内质向前。

sentences.english: On ultrasound, Wilms' appears as a large, heterogeneous mass of the kidney.
sentences.chinese: 表现为肾脏体积巨大不均质回声肿物。

sentences.english: With cutlery, look for silver or stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 至于餐具，请选择银质或不锈钢质产品。

sentences.english: He was such a fan of chewing tobacco that brass spittoons were installed in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他嗜烟如命，以至于把黄铜质的痰盂都放在白宫。

sentences.english: Specially designed for hair damaged from coloring and perm treatments.
sentences.chinese: 专为因染发及电发后发质受损人士而设。

copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
